title: naraayaNaya namO
sahitya:
Narayanaaya Namo Maadhavayanamo



anupallavi



Naagendra Sayanaaya Nandhithaakila Lokhaya



caraNam 1



Naabhi kamala janitha vidhi mukhaaya

Noothana Jala thaaraapaya

Naanaa saraasara naaree nara roopaaya

Naaradhaadhi muni vandhyaanantha gana Mayaaya



caraNam 2



Akanitha Guna Ganaaya Aagama Kheyaaya

Vikhalitha Bhay sokaaya

Gagana nirmala bodha gambheera paavaaya

Bhagavatha bhaktha hridaya padma bhanu roopaaya



caraNam 3



Karadhritha ratha charana kambu pankaja

Kau modhakee saarnkhaaya

Niravathi kara sobhi nija kausthuba bhooshaaya

pari hritha para bhaksha pakshiraja vaahaaya



caraNam 4



Aamayaathi virahithaakila mayaaya

kaama koti sundharaya

Nama rooa rahitha bhoomaika roopaaya

Soma soory nayana saama gaana kheyaaya



caraNam 5



Jagadhega naadhaaya jaatha madhanaaya

Jitha vairi mandalaaya

nigama nishvaasaaya nithyaanandha roopaaya

nirupama gokula neetha nava neethaaya



caraNam 6



Vaarija lochanaaya vaasudevaaya

vara muni paarijaathaaya

karunaakara bhaktha kaarunya saaraaya

Naarayana Theertha natha charanaabjaaya
